headline: Is Constellation Brands (STZ) Now Attractive After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: If you are wondering whether Constellation Brands is offering good value at its current share price, this article walks through what the numbers say in plain English. The stock most recently closed at US$156.70, with returns of 11.0% over the last month but a 10.6% decline over the past year and a 27.8% decline over three years. Recent coverage of Constellation Brands has focused on its position as a major player in the US beer and spirits market, and on how investors are weighing that brand...
